author: Richard Whately
message: Lose an hour in the morning, and you will spend all day looking for it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Bruce Lee
message: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
title: Thought of the day

author: William Shakespeare
message: Go to your bosom: Knock there, and ask your heart what it doth know.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dalai Lama
message: Happiness mainly comes from our own attitude, rather than from external factors.
title: Thought of the day
